title: Reflection and Learning
description: The system must learn and use reflection to improve, with persistent knowledge base growth.
rules: Implement reflection mechanisms for agents to analyze their performance
Capture lessons learned from execution for future improvement
Persist improvements to knowledge base for long-term retention
Use historical data and patterns to improve future performance
Implement continuous learning loops in agent workflows
Implement knowledge validation and quality control
Use reflection to improve decision-making processes
examples: Capturing and storing lessons learned in knowledge base
Using historical patterns to optimize future executions
Implementing knowledge sharing between related agents
Using reflection data to improve planning and decision-making
exceptions: Time-sensitive operations where reflection would cause delays
Critical operations where learning could impact reliability
